targets.query: select "heapMemoryTotalUsed" as Used from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where  "role" = 'driver'  AND time > now() -$timeInterval
select "processCpuLoad" as process from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where  "role" = 'driver'  AND time > now() -$timeInterval
select "heapMemoryTotalUsed" as Used from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where  "processUuid" =~ /^$executorProcessUuid$/ AND time > now() -$timeInterval
select "processCpuLoad" as process from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where  "processUuid" =~ /^$executorProcessUuid$/ AND time > now() -$timeInterval

select "memoryPools-EdenSpace-usageUsed" as EdenSpace, "memoryPools-SurvivorSpace-usageUsed" as  SurvivorSpace, "memoryPools-TenuredGen-usageUsed" as  TenuredGen from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where "role"='driver' AND time > now() -$timeInterval

select "memoryPools-CodeCache-usageUsed" as CodeCache, "memoryPools-CompressedClassSpace-usageUsed" as  CompressedClassSpace, "memoryPools-Metaspace-usageUsed" as  Metaspace from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where "role"='driver' AND $timeFilter
select "gc-Copy-collectionTime" as Copy, "gc-MarkSweepCompact-collectionTime" as  MarkSweepCompact from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where "role"='driver' AND time > now() - 30m

select "memoryPools-EdenSpace-usageUsed" as EdenSpace, "memoryPools-SurvivorSpace-usageUsed" as  SurvivorSpace, "memoryPools-TenuredGen-usageUsed" as  TenuredGen from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where "processUuid" =~ /^$executorProcessUuid$/ AND time > now() -$timeInterval

select "memoryPools-CodeCache-usageUsed" as CodeCache, "memoryPools-CompressedClassSpace-usageUsed" as  CompressedClassSpace, "memoryPools-Metaspace-usageUsed" as  Metaspace from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where "processUuid" =~ /^$executorProcessUuid$/ AND time > now() -$timeInterval

select "gc-Copy-collectionTime" as Copy, "gc-MarkSweepCompact-collectionTime" as  MarkSweepCompact from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where "processUuid" =~ /^$executorProcessUuid$/ AND time > now() - 30m
select "heapMemoryCommitted" as Committed, "heapMemoryTotalUsed" as Used from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where   "processUuid" =~ /^$executorProcessUuid$/ AND time > now() -$timeInterval
select "heapMemoryCommitted" as Committed, "heapMemoryTotalUsed" as Used from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where  "role" = 'driver' AND time > now() -$timeInterval

select "bufferPools-direct-memoryUsed" as Used, "bufferPools-direct-totalCapacity" as  Capacity from "metrics"."autogen"."CpuAndMemory"  where "processUuid" =~ /^$executorProcessUuid$/ AND time > now() - 30m
select  /^stat-idle.*/,/^stat-iowait.*/,/^stat-nice.*/,/^stat-system.*/,/^stat-user.*/ from "metrics"."autogen"."IO" where "processUuid" =~ /^$executorProcessUuid$/ AND time > now() - 1h

select  "host", "threadName", "threadState"  from "metrics"."autogen"."Stacktrace" where "processUuid" =~ /^$executorProcessUuid$/ AND ("threadState" = 'WAITING' OR "threadState" = 'BLOCKED' ) AND time > now() - 10m
